mapper.select: select t.*,fun_dist(#{longitude},#{latitude},t.longitude,t.latitude) as dist from t_activity t where fun_dist(#{longitude},#{latitude},t.longitude,t.latitude) < 10 and deleted = 1 order by dist
select * from t_activity as a LEFT JOIN t_activity_details as ac on a.id =ac.a_id WHERE a.user_uuid = #{useruuid}

select t.id,t.activity_desc,t.activity_type_name,t.activity_type_code,t.voice_url, t.voice_file_size,t.voice_time,t.pic_url,t.avatar_images,t.user_uuid,t.user_name,t.is_friend,t.is_user,t.publish_time ,t.deleted,t.longitude,t.latitude,t.birthday from t_activity t where fun_dist(#{longitude},#{latitude},t.longitude,t.latitude) < 10 and deleted = 1 having t.publish_time order by t.publish_time desc

select t.*,fun_dist(#{longitude},#{latitude},t.longitude,t.latitude) as dist from t_activity t where fun_dist(#{longitude},#{latitude},t.longitude,t.latitude) < 10 and deleted = 1 and user_uuid=#{id} order by dist
